long_description: Even when you're getting soaked, keep your pack and its contents dry with the lightweight, waterproof Osprey UL raincover, available here in a medium size. Osprey UL raincover cover is ideally sized for packs 2,400 - 4,300 cu. in. (40 - 70 liters). Light, 40-denier ripstop nylon is coated with polyurethane to keep water and snow from penetrating. Drawcord lets you securely cinch cover around pack for a snug fit. Osprey UL raincover packs down small to minimize space in your pack when not in use.
short_description: Even when you're getting soaked, keep your pack and its contents dry with the lightweight, waterproof Osprey UL raincover, available here in a medium size.
